doc.title: Journey to the Centre of Love
doc.plot: Yu Wan-chen in Taipei, a student of marine biology of Christian background, grows up with doubts about her faith. Are all religions not the same? She also needs to re-define her moral stand when she becomes pregnant in college. A scholarship allows her to complete her graduate studies in London. Martin, in London, is a waiter whose ambition in life is to become a professional dancer. When he is invited to dance the role of the Creator God, he begins to reflect on the plausibility of there existing an Ultimate Reality. He wrestles with the question whether such a Ground of Being could be personal? Whether God knows us, and whether we can relate to God
